name: Dino Run (DevKage)
description:
Dino Run is a 2D side scroller made using Flutter and Flame engine. It is basically a clone of T-Rex game that you see in Google Chrome. The only difference is this one is much better visually.

I am making this game as part of a YouTube series on my channel. So if you are interested in learning how to make this game check out this playlist. - DevKage - Dino Run. And while you are at it, maybe also subscribe to my channel there.
